#include<stdio.h>
#include<malloc.h>

int main(){
	int nStudent, nPair, Cost;
	int i, j, k, t, min = 99999999;
	int **pair;
	int nQueue[1005], count = 0, visited[1005];
	int head, tail; 
	//freopen("Sample.txt", "rb", stdin);
	scanf("%d %d %d", &nStudent, &nPair, &Cost);
	pair = (int **)malloc(sizeof(int *) * nStudent + 1);
	for (i = 0; i <= nStudent; i++)
		pair[i] = (int *)malloc(sizeof(int) * nStudent + 1);

	//assign default values
	for (i = 1; i <= nStudent; i++)
		for (j = 1; j <= nStudent; j++)
			pair[i][j] = -1;
	for (i = 1; i <= nStudent; i++)
		visited[i] = 0;
	//scan pairs
	for (i = 0; i < nPair; i++){
		int f1, f2;
		scanf("%d %d", &f1, &f2);
		pair[f1][f2] = 1;
	}
	if (nPair == 0)
		min = 1;
	head = tail = 0;

	for (i = 1; i <= nStudent; i++){
		k = i;
		while (head <= tail){
			visited[k] = i;
			for (j = 1; j <= nStudent; j++){
				if (pair[k][j] == 1) {
					count++;
					if (visited[j] != i){
						nQueue[tail] = j;
						tail++;
						if (tail > 1005)
							tail = 0;
					}
				}
			}
			k= nQueue[head];
			head++;
			if (head > 1005)
				head = 0;
		}
		if (count < min){
			min = count;
		}
		count = 0;
		head--;
	}
	if (min == 0) min = 1;
	printf("%d\n", min*Cost);
	return 0;
}
